details: Built Real-Time LOE and Capital Spending Analysis platform that integrates with existing company applications.
Maintained Compression Station optimization program, interacting with technologies such as Redis, MQTT, Modbus, etc.
Developed NGL Analysis application leveraging Procount data to ensure consistency between EOG and 3rd party purchaser data.
Designed and implemented a novel autochoke algorithm using FastAPI to maximize oil production and minimize emissions. This algorithm has been adopted across the company.
Developed real-time cost tracking and forecasting systems for water disposal, flowback, and capital expenditures utilizing SQL, Python and Spotfire.
Collaborated closely with engineers to develop a wide range of data analyses and reports utilizing SQL and Spotfire.
Used Python, SQL, and Excel to automate property performance reports.
Improved and automated quarterly reports given to executives.
Developed internal applications for mapping facilities and frac locations.
Utilized SQL and Python to locate anomalies in production.

education.major: B.S. in Applied Mathematics and B.S. in Business Administration (Concentration in Economics and Finance)
details: Student Government Association Senator and Vice President
Varsity Tennis, Varsity Cross Country, and Junior Varsity Basketball
